_header: A fox gan out of the wood go
Title(s): Of the Vox and of the Wolf
_description: Of the Vox and of the Wolf — 295 lines in couplets

BodDig86.First Lines:
A vox gon out of þe wode goAfingret so þat him wes
                    wo…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…For he ne fond noneskunnes blisseNehof duntes
                    forȝeuenesse
BodDig86.Attributed Title: Of þe vox and of þe wolf (f. 138)
